contents.content: _{You must take three archetype feats before you can start another.}
_{Assurance: May choose to take 10 rather than roll.}
_{The memories of your ancestors grant you temporary knowledge of a skill.}
contents.title: _{Ancestral Memories}

contents.content: _{Deduct hardness, then apply remaining damage to both shield and yourself.}
contents.title: _{Shield Block}

contents.content: _{Signature spells can be heightened without learning separately.}
_{The memories of your ancestors grant you temporary knowledge of a skill.}
_{Undermine a spell, making it easier to defend against.}
_{Grant you or a target +1 to skill checks.}
_{Be temporarily trained in a non-Lore skill, or a Lore skill related to your ancestry.}
_{Follow this by casting a spell with a duration of 1 minute to extend it to 10 minutes.}
_{The spell may not be the highest level you can cast. You may only extend one spell at a time.}

defs.trigger: _{You see a creature cast a spell}

contents.content: _{Undermine the spell, granting +2 to saving throws, skill checks, AC or DC against it.}
_{Reduce the spell's level by 1, down to its minimum level.}
_{A surge of memories grant you or one other a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.}
